title: Pie Hole
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Pizza, Italian, Fast food, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Downtown pizzeria opened late Sept 2015. Features a daily vegan pizza available by the slice, in addition to other vegan pizzas available to order.  Vegan pizzas feature a made-in-house vegan roux. Other alternative sauces include hummus, vegan pesto, and Thai peanut sauce. Vegan cheese available.
